# MHWapp

This global map shows much of the area around Nova Scotia and is designed to be viewed as a static web page for passing curiosity.


# Updates

* July 18th, 2019
  * Rolled back the animation as it was too beefy for the raspberry pi running it

* July 17th, 2019
  * Removed most of the unneeded code for the interactive map content
  * Added an animated front page

* July 16th, 2019
  * Copied the MHWapp to this location so it can be shown on the display TV in the 5th floor hallway of the Dalhousie Oceanograph Department
  * This app differs from the operational Marine Heatwave Tracker in that it only shows the map and can't be clicked on
